scripts.build:chrome: node -e "import('./build-scripts/logger.mjs').then(m => m.logStep('Building Chrome extension'))" && cross-env BUILD_MODE=build webpack --config webpack.chrome.js --mode production
scripts.build:firefox: node -e "import('./build-scripts/logger.mjs').then(m => m.logStep('Building Firefox extension'))" && cross-env BUILD_MODE=build webpack --config webpack.firefox.js --mode production
scripts.build: node -e "import('./build-scripts/logger.mjs').then(m => m.logStep('Running Build for All Browsers'))" && pnpm run build:chrome && pnpm run build:firefox
scripts.watch:chrome: node -e "import('./build-scripts/logger.mjs').then(m => m.logStep('Watching Chrome...'))" && cross-env BUILD_MODE=watch webpack --config webpack.chrome.js --watch --mode development
scripts.watch:firefox: node -e "import('./build-scripts/logger.mjs').then(m => m.logStep('Watching Firefox...'))" && cross-env BUILD_MODE=watch webpack --config webpack.firefox.js --watch --mode development
scripts.publish: node -e "import('./build-scripts/logger.mjs').then(m => m.logStep('Publishing All Artifacts'))" && cross-env PUBLISH_MODE=true pnpm run source && cross-env PUBLISH_MODE=true pnpm run build
